SQL.LOAD: SELECT oc_message_params_id, oc_message_id, param_name, param_value, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_oc_message_params WHERE oc_message_params_id = :oc_message_params_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_MESSAGE_ID: SELECT oc_message_params_id, oc_message_id, param_name, param_value, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_oc_message_params WHERE oc_message_id = :oc_message_id
